title: What was your first ever favorite character and what made that change?
body:
I was having a discussion with my roommate about childhood cartoon favorites, and we got around to discussing how the internet ruined our favorite characters for us.

When I discovered the internet, I fucking loved Renamon, and why wouldn't I? She's a total baller, right?
Whelp, one day after drawing my lil kiddie Renamon fanarts of her in cool fighting poses, I decided to look up what other people had drawn of my most beloved character.
Come to find out, the internet loves Renamon in a very different way than I did.
http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/968/815/ca3.jpg

How about you, GD? What was your first favorite character, and what ruined them for you?
